description: ), 3BR, 1050000, Astounding 2636 sqft townhouse condo sitting atop of a small hill with no condo fee! This renovated unit features a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances,  gleaming hardwood floors,  high ceilings,  and huge windows that allow a TON of sunlight. This brick home overlooks Cabot Park with an abundance of privacy. Located 120 feet from Cabot Elementary School,  1/2 mile form Newton North High School,  5 minute car ride to Newton Center,  Newton Corner (I-90),  West Newton/Auburndale (I-95),  3 minutes to Comm Ave (route 30). description: $875,  June thru August 2016 (Commonwealth Avenue), 1BR, 875, Spacious room for rent right on Commonwealth Avenue. The apartment will be shared with two other young professionals. The apartment also includes a furnished living room,  one bathroom,  and full kitchen. The apartment is on the second floor of the building. There is a laundry room available for use in the basement of the building that is coin-operated. The room will be available for rent from June through August 2016. You will be asked to sign on the lease so it can be official. The rent is $875/month which is due on the first of every month. Utilities is currently only around $15/month. Upon move-in,  you will need to have first and last months rent,  as well as a security deposit equal to one months rent.The room has furniture available if needed. That includes a brand-new full sized bed and boxspring,  a glass work desk,  office chair,  and one dresser for storage. The room also has a closet. The room also includes an awesome front-facing view.The apartment rests along Commonwealth Avenue. The Griggs St. subway stop for the T is footsteps away from the building,  and the 66 bus is only a block away. There is a Starbucks right across the street. One block away from Harvard avenue,  which is a busy street for shopping and restaurants.Roommates are busy professionals but enjoy going out every now and then. Looking for a roommate who is respectable and considerate. There is a possibility of signing a years lease following August 2016.Please reach out if you have any more questions or would like to schedule some time to come see the apartment.

description: @Unit,  Gr8 Loca~Ava 9/1 (South End), 4BR, 6000, ID: 2144451Location: Massachusetts Ave.,  Boston (South End)Rent: $6000 / MonthBroker Fee: No Fee!Available Date: 09/01/2016Beds: 4Baths: 2Pet: NegotiableFeatures: A/C,  Balcony,  Central Air,  Dishwasher,  Disposal,  Exposed Brick,  Granite Counter Tops,  Hardwood Floors,  Laundry in Unit,  Microwave,  Modern Bath,  Modern Kitchen,  New Appliances,  New/Renovated Bath,  New/Renovated Kitchen,  Pantry,  Private Roof Deck,  Stainless Steel Appliance(s)Massive Four Bedroom,  Two Bathroom Newly Constructed Apartment in South End!The most attractive feature of this unique upper level apartment is the massive open floor plan of the living,  dining and kitchen area overlooking the City of Boston. The floor to ceiling windows wrapping the building's corner toward the intersection of Mass Ave./ Washington Street provide spectacular panoramic views of the Boston skyline. Enjoy wonderful views down Massachusetts Avenue into the South End and beyond.This spacious upper level four bedroom,  two bathroom apartment balances the historic character of the original industrial building with the contemporary modern finishes and amenities. This unit is equipped with the latest in urban utilities. This large two bedroom apartment features a beautifully equipped kitchen with all new stainless steel appliances,  granite countertops with waterfall ends,  a garbage disposal,  a dishwasher and a bar roomy enough to seat three.The dining area features a built in hutch/ bar for dining ware/ cocktail storage. This high level unit receives spectacular sun and long views from all common areas and private bedrooms. There are hardwood floors throughout the apartment.The apartment has a private washer and dryer,  central heating and air conditioning. The unit is also furnished with an on demand gas fired hot water heater as well as a high efficiency boiler. Parking is available at an additional cost.The redevelopment of this property has brought this historic gem of the South End back to life. Located near the corner of Massachusetts Avenue and Washington Street,  this building is in the heart of restaurant row in Boston's South End! A few of the highly acclaimed restaurants which are a stone's throw away include Turo,  Terango,  Seiyo Wine Sushi,  Equator Thai,  Stella and Mike's Diner. The apartment is a 2 bedroom/ 2 bathroom apartment so you will have your own private bedroom and bathroom,  but you will share the living room and kitchen with my roommate who is a 28 years old female working at a company in Cambridge. The room is furnished,  but if you would like to bring your own bedroom furniture,  that should not be a problem.The building is a luxury building which has a fitness room,  laundry in each floor,  community room,  24/7 concierge,  garage,  bike storage,  central AC in each unit,  and literally 10 steps to the red line train/buses! The location is very convenient; 2 whole foods,  Trade Joe's,  post office,  and tons of restaurants and shops. The rent of the 1BR/1BR is $1225 monthly for May and June and $1275 for July and August (the rent increases yearly in July). As for utilities,  your share of the bills is $ 57.07 for Comcast Internet and Cable and $30 for electricity (higher with AC/ heating usage)My roommate and I are looking for someone who likes to keep the place clean and comfortable and who is respectful and friendly. Also,  unfortunately,  I am allergic to cats and dogs so no pets in the apartment please. Moreover,  due to building restrictions,  only one person is allowed to sublease the room and stay in visitors are not allowed either. Finally,  your name will be added to our lease for the duration you are renting the room so you will need to fill in an application rental in order for the the building management to run a background/credit check.E-mail me if interestedThanks

description: .,  3 min. from T,  great for MIT/Harvard/Tufts (Somerville), 1BR, 985, Large,  270 ft^2 bedroom,  on the third floor of a two-apartment house in charming Davis Square,  Somerville. The bedroom is part of a 4 bed/2br apartment,  shared by 3 other people.The bedroom has a closet,  and ample space for a bed and other equipment like a desktop computer and desks. While the bedroom will be unfurnished,  the rest of the apartment is fully furnished with a large living room,  including a 55' flat screen television and wireless internet access; a large dining room,  great for breakfast in the morning and dinner with friends at night; a large kitchen with a full assortment of pots and pans,  knives and baking equipment; two full bathrooms,  one just feet away from the bedroom for rent,  and the other downstairs,  so scheduling in the morning is never an issue; two porches,  front and back; a driveway leading to a garage,  which is currently housing motorcycles,  but is great for an avid hobbyist and accompanying projects; and a washer/dryer in the basement.The apartment is situated across from a lovely park,  which is great for sunny afternoon frisbee or picnics. Additionally,  the MBTA Davis Square Red Line stop is only a 3 minute walk,  making it an easy 16-minute commute to MIT,  or a 8-minute commute to Harvard. There is also quick and easy access to the northern Boston suburbs via buses from the Alewife station,  making this apartment an excellent opportunity for interns in the Cambridge/Somerville/north Boston area. Finally,  the apartment is also only 6 minutes away from Davis Square,  which offers an eclectic variety of venues,  including BBQ and vegan restaurants,  a comedy club,  an array of bars for dancing and nightlife,  as well as a lovely,  independently owned movie theater - the best in Boston!The monthly rent is $985,  with a cost for utilities and cable/internet (in Summer months,  this is less than a hundred dollars),  which can be prorated for your time staying. My roommates are two engineers and a mental health professional,  and we are planning to move out at the end of the summer,  so there is an opportunity for you to extend the lease if you're interested.Please tell us a little about yourself in your message so we can see if this could be a good fit. The apartment is generally quiet,  but we love having a good time,  and have been known to host parties and barbecues. Available housing dates are from 05/13/16 to 08/31/16 (E.O.L.). First month rent required in full,  payments made before the first of the month otherwise.

description: ), 2BR, 700, Enjoy modern living in one of the most desirable neighborhoods at the Lofts at Kendall Square. Choose from spacious one- and two-bedroom layouts,  each loaded with the same great amenities including exposed beams,  natural light and columns throughout. The entranceway leads to gorgeous 9-foot ceilings with crown molding and wood flooring throughout with plenty of space to get comfortable. Walk-in closets in the bedroom make it easy to organize and your very own private balcony lets you enjoy the outdoors any time you wish. The community offers plenty of amenities as well,  including a fitness center with a cardio studio and a laundry facility that affords you the convenience of doing your chores at home. Valet dry cleaning services and extra storage spaces are available as well. Management and maintenance are both onsite and on-call,  ready to help you when you need it. The Lofts at Kendall Square is a pet-friendly community welcoming both dogs and cats.
